name: Apex Of The Monsters
description:
WARNING: GAME IS NOT COMPLETE AND MAY CONTAIN BUGS. IF SCREEN IS BLURRY, FULL SCREEN AND THEN PRESS ESCAPE TO FIX.

Please fill out our feedback form if you have the time. :)

Welcome to Apex Of The Monsters:

Apex Of The Monsters is a spiritual successor to Luftrausers. You play as a mighty dragon struggling to claw your way to the top of the food chain and become the apex monster, you have a lot of opponents to go through to get there.

Destroy the flying beasts, destroy the humans and become the ultimate hunter!

Controls:

Up Arrow: Accelerate 

Left & Right Arrow: Turn 

Space Bar: Shoot

E key: Consume your enemies (hold down to deal more damage and restore more health)

Q, W, R key: Use your abilities

Healing: You have minimal passive healing and will require to use your consume ability to gain health back. Using consume on enemies with lower health or that are on fire will provide additional healing.

Best of luck!
